movies.title: Gone with the Bullets
movies.plot: Set in 1920s Shanghai, Ma Zouri and Xiang Feitian establish a notorious beauty pageant called the Flowers Competition. All of the city's elite attend the gala event, but when Wanyan Ying unexpectedly wins, it sets into motion a series of tragic events that change their destinies.
movies.simplePlot: Set in 1920s Shanghai, Ma Zouri and Xiang Feitian establish a notorious beauty pageant called the Flowers Competition. All of the city's elite attend the gala event, but when Wanyan Ying ...

biography.bio: Zhang Wen was born on June 26, 1984 in Xi'an, Shaanxi, China. He is an actor and director, known for Journey to the West (2013), L'amour n'est pas aveugle (2011) and Ocean Heaven (2010). He has been married to Yili Ma since January 31, 2008. They have two children.
biography.name: Zhang Wen

biography.bio: Zhiwen Wang was born on June 25, 1966 in Shanghai, China. He is known for his work on Together with You (2002), Battle of the Warriors (2006) and The Golden Era (2014).
biography.name: Zhiwen Wang

biography.bio: Ms. Hung Huang is one of the most famous media and celebrity who has a near fifteen years of working experience in United States and European countries. She played carried out planning, implementation and other services for some multi-national firms and played important role during industrial and financial executives investing in China in recent days. Since March 2000, Hung served as president of China Interactive Media Group, and planning the publication of three different styles of magazines for foreigners in China. In addition, she often write columns for different types of magazines and published at least two autobiographies. In 2006 She wrote a script for "Wu qiong dong" and play a role in it. She is also popular guest in many talk show in both English and Chinese.
biography.name: Huang Hung

biography.bio: Harrison Liu is an actor and director, known for Black Robe (1991), The Diary of Evelyn Lau (1994) and Foreign Moon (1996).
biography.name: Harrison Liu

biography.bio: Ying Na was born on November 27, 1967 in Shenyang, Liaoning, China. She is known for her work on I Love My Family (1993), A Native of Beijing in New York (1993) and Sorry Baby (1999).
biography.name: Ying Na

biography.bio: Ben Niu was born as Zhang Xue Jing. He is an actor and composer, known for To Live (1994), Happy Times (2000) and Little big soldier (2010).
biography.name: Ben Niu

biography.bio: You Ge was born on April 19, 1957 in Beijing, China. He is an actor, known for To Live (1994), Let the Bullets Fly (2010) and Farewell My Concubine (1993). He has been married to Cong He since 1987.
biography.name: You Ge

biography.bio: Bruno Gensburger is known for his work on Gone with the Bullets (2014), Blind Mountain (2007) and Ex-Model (2014).
biography.name: Bruno Gensburger

biography.bio: Wen Jiang was born on January 5, 1963 in Tangshan, China. He is an actor and director, known for Rogue One (2016), Les démons à ma porte (2000) and Let the Bullets Fly (2010). He has been married to Yun Zhou since 2005. They have one child. He was previously married to Sandrine Chenivisse.
biography.name: Wen Jiang

biography.bio: Dominique Kelley is known for his work on La La Land (2016), The Princess and the Frog (2009) and Ted 2 (2015).
biography.name: Dominique Kelley

biography.bio: Lu Liu is an actress, known for A Touch of Sin (2013), Battle of Changsha (2014) and Mountains May Depart (2015).
biography.name: Lu Liu

biography.bio: Doug Penikas is an actor and cinematographer, known for High School Musical 3: Senior Year (2008), Glee (2009) and High School Musical 2 (2007).
biography.name: Doug Penikas

biography.bio: Matthew Ray Ruggles is an American actor, and musician based out of Beijing, China. Originally from Jackson, MI, Matthew moved to China in 2011 to pursue his film career. Matthew is the son of two musicians and began acting as a child in musicals, continuing his career in theatre throughout adolescence and into adulthood. After a few years of studying at Western Michigan University, Matthew decided that there was nothing else he'd rather do than perform. Taking that initiative he entered the film market in 2006 working as an extra, and eventually moved to China in 2011 to begin taking on serious roles. In 2013 Matthew helped establish an organization that brought together foreign actors all across China in an effort to further their careers domestically and abroad.
biography.name: Matthew Ray Ruggles

biography.bio: Julie Schmid is an actress, known for La La Land (2016), The Concert (2017) and Gone with the Bullets (2014).
biography.name: Julie Schmid

biography.bio: Born in Taiwan, Qi Shu has won the prestigious Golden Horse Awards in Taiwan (regarded as the East Asian Oscars) for Best Supporting Actress. She has also received a nomination for Best Actress from the Golden Horse Awards. She appeared with Jackie Chan in the romantic comedy Gorgeous (1999) ("Gorgeous"). Her name is spelled in a variety of ways, including Hsu Qi, Hsu Chi, Qi Shu, and Shu Kei, and there are quite a few other variations on her name on foreign V.C.D.s, D.V.D.s, and internet sites.
biography.name: Qi Shu
